chapter.title: Settings
chapter.para: When working with the A4 website some things need to be setup correctly or you will not be able to load data into the system. The first time you start the database in the bottom of the screen you will see a message that say "You need to setup your A4 page". If you click on the A4 tab you will be able to setup the system correctly.
chapter.note: If you delete your cookies or move computers you will have to accomplish this section
chapter.para: The following is a step by step guide to setting this up
